EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar: Real Examples of Data-Driven Store Transformation
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> In your grocery or convenience stores, you want to make it easier for shoppers to buy and simpler and less expensive for you to serve. Register for our webinar to see how other leading grocery and c-stores used their store data and our expert modeling to: - Transform the shopping experience - Bring down operational costs - And release retail space to add new offers like food-to-go Title: Data-Driven Store Transformation Date: May 19, 2021 | 2:00pm EST REGISTER NOW <[[https://ncr.webex.com/mw3300/mywebex/default.do?nomenu=true&siteurl=ncr&service=6&rnd=0.769224372988143&main_url=https%3A%2F%2Fncr.webex.com%2Fec3300%2Feventcenter%2Fevent%2FeventAction.do%3FtheAction%3Ddetail%26%26%26EMK%3D4832534b00000004de8f643034f0ed025115f7c9203378f0995b3f1ab4400c676bad080572b7b2e3%26siteurl%3Dncr%26confViewID%3D190747474430796755%26encryptTicket%3DSDJTSwAAAATVuz5Nfnt_Cg7N7TluRapUNYheGjjZeSqKd53Agdtwmg2%26]]> ${CTAText2} <[[${CTAURL}?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> Â© 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
